entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: A person mentioned as someone who nearly did something bad to Ron.

relationships.description: Harry is planning to go to Hogsmeade again.
Hermione threatens to tell Professor McGonagall about Harry's map.
Ron was nearly harmed by Sirius Black.
